title: Leaving Toxic Relationships & Keeping Healthy Relationships
description:
This week, Tasia and Camo discuss some of the toxic relationships in their lives (cheating, backstabbing, etc.), how they finally recognized it, and how they ultimately cut those people out of their lives. On the other side, they give advice as to not be a toxic friend/partner and the work it takes to maintain healthy relationships, both platonic and romantic. They also talk about how some people can't let go of the past even when you're trying to improve yourself, and how that can be triggering and bring negative energy into your life.
Plus, Camo talks about past heartbreaks and Tasia explains how past bad relationships has made her appreciate her marriage.
Watch "Unfazed and Unbothered" on YouTube
